body: The book contains cloudkill, geas/quest, limited wish, and polymorph any object. The reader may treat her caster level as four levels higher than normal for the purpose of crafting an iron golem. Strong conjuration, enchantment, and transmutation; CL 16th; Craft Construct, creator must be caster level 16th, cloudkill, geas/quest, limited wish, polymorph any object.
name: Iron Golem Manual
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Golem Manual/Description/Iron Golem Manual
